title: Smug

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Can ressurect 1 Discordian Role if killed
Is allowed to pick music for the game, because fuck you.
At the beginning of the game, is told how many Factions are in play, though not how many members each faction has.

desc:
Post 1722
*It's better to have loved and lost than never loved at all*
*Just love the lust, you'll have the leap without the fall*
